sys_ui_macro.name: AgentSearch
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
<g:dialog_button title = "Use this button to Search Agents" onClick = "agents()" name = "agents" id = "agents" type = "button">Add Agents'</g:dialog_button>
	<script>
		function agents(){
			//alert('Running Script from UI Macro');
			var dialog = new GlideDialogWindow('x_amfai_cacmdba_select_agents');
			dialog.setTitle("Select Agents'");
			dialog.render();
		}
	</script>
</j:jelly>
